# PoolManager constructor

Initializes a new instance of the PoolManager class.

```csharp
public PoolManager(Pool sharedPool, DbType dbType)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| sharedPool | The shared connection pool to use |
| dbType | Type of database this manager will handle |
